ContactFormSubmission.title: Contact Form Submission
ContactFormSubmission.description: A submission from the website contact form.

fullName.description: The full name of the person.

email.description: The email address of the person.

contactNumber.description: The contact number of the person.

submissionDate.description: The date and time of the submission.

MobileBanner.title: Mobile Banner
MobileBanner.description: A banner to be displayed on mobile devices.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the banner image.

position.description: The display order of the banner.

status.description: Whether the banner is active and should be displayed.

createdAt.description: The date and time of the banner creation.

WebBanner.title: Web Banner
WebBanner.description: A banner to be displayed on desktop/web devices.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the banner image.

position.description: The display order of the banner.

status.description: Whether the banner is active and should be displayed.

createdAt.description: The date and time of the banner creation.

/contactFormSubmissions/{submissionId}.description: Stores all submissions from the contact form.

/mobileBanners/{bannerId}.description: Stores all mobile banners for the website.

/webBanners/{bannerId}.description: Stores all web banners for the website.
